title: How does the music industry formulate a hit song? - Quora

response.answer_text: They have to work with talented musicians and songwriters. Some of it is just luck. There is no formula that can guarantee a song will be a hit but if you can emulate a song that's already popular without copying it, you might have a chance.

I suppose they look at the artist the type of music that is current and who they are going to aim it at then find a song get the air play for it promote it and then cross there fingers and toes and hope all the effort bears fruit
